input.sentences: she was going to be his bride for life
friends and family were there for support
it was a great wedding with the guys
and all the family members enjoyed it
output.sentences: Today is the wedding day and the mother and father couldn't be happier.
The father of the bride wanted to make sure to get a picture with his daughter and her closest friends.
Everyone in the bridal party had a wonderful time at the wedding.
Family came from all over the country to love and celebrate the happy couple.
The parents of the bride and groom were ecstatic that everything went off without a hitch!
